item.title: Five killed in Bangkok market mass shooting
item.description: Police say officers are investigating the motive behind the incident in Thailand's capital.

item.title: More than 40 killed in DR Congo attack linked to Islamic State
item.description: Most of the dead were worshippers taking part in a night vigil which was stormed by armed men, officials said.

item.title: Sewage spill caused deadly train derailment in Germany, police say
item.description: The train driver, another rail employee and one passenger died, while 41 people were injured , prosecutors say.

item.title: US-EU tariff deal a big Trump win but not a total defeat for Brussels
item.description: The agreement is a major step in Trump's plan to shake up global trade, which he says was weighted against America.

item.title: How Trump wants the US to cash in on mineral-rich DR Congo's peace deal
item.description: The US president is spearheading an ambitious but controversial deal to end a long-running conflict.
